entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6Â°C

Observed at: Atikokan 3:00 AM EST Wednesday 5 April 2023

Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
